name: step (Andi)
description:
step is a journey. All forms of depression can cause a severe lack of energy in those afflicted with it. Get ready for the day and be careful about the amount of energy you exert. You only have so much.

THIS IS A DEMO/ WORK IN PROGRESS!!

The ideal way to play step is to not click through the pauses. That is to say- when a text box appears, click to move to the next screen. When a menu appears, select the option you want to choose. Beyond that, however, do not click the screen. There will always be another option that comes up on its own. 

Be aware this game has no explicit trigger warnings, but a content warning for severe depresession and poor mental health is applicable. Please also read the About section before beginning to play.

This game is available for both PC (Windows) and Mac.
